name: kottster-monorepo
description: Kottster monorepo - Instant admin panel for your app

scripts.dev: echo 'This is the Kottster framework source. To create an app, run: npx @kottster/cli@latest new my-app' && echo 'To build the framework packages, run: npm run build:all'
scripts.build:all: npm run build:common && npm run build:cli && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: cd packages/common && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../cli && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../server && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
